name: Superhero Run - Deadpool Adventure Version
description:
Superhero Run - Deadpool Adventure Version is a FREE and fun adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Tap to Jump, double tap for double jump.

Get as far as possible and collect coins - that will give extra points to be on the top of the leaderboard!

Invite friends to play for double fun!

Help the deadpool to jump with just an easy touch.

Superhero Run - Deadpool Adventure Version is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
